articles.title: AP preseason All-America team highlighted by Alabama stars - The Associated Press
articles.description: Alabama stars Bryce Young and Will Anderson Jr. are among four players from the top-ranked Crimson Tide  selected to The Associated Press preseason All-America team.
articles.content:
